org.magdaaproject.utils
Class FileUtils

java.lang.Object
  org.magdaaproject.utils.FileUtils

public class FileUtils
extends java.lang.Object

a utility class which exposes utility methods for interacting with files and the filesystem

isDirectoryWriteable

public static boolean isDirectoryWriteable(java.lang.String path)
check to see if a directory is writeable if it exists, if it doesn't exist this method tries to create it

path - the file system path to check
Returns:

listFilesInDir

public static java.lang.String[] listFilesInDir(java.lang.String dirPath,
                                                java.lang.String extension)
                                         throws java.io.IOException
get a list of files in a directory

Parameters:
dirPath - the directory to search for files
extension - an extension to filter the list of files, if empty all files are returned
Returns:
an array of file names or null if no files match
Throws:
java.io.IOException

listFilesInDir

                                                java.lang.String[] extensions)
                                         throws java.io.IOException
get a list of files in a directory

Parameters:
dirPath - the directory to search for files
extensions - a list of extensions to filter the list of files, if null all files are returns
Returns:
an array of file names or null if no files match
Throws:
java.io.IOException
